website_summaries.verdict: Very affordable alternative to full service professional stopwatches. Many customers order this stopwatch model in bulk.
cons: Alarm/chime feature difficult to turn off

customer_reviews.title: Thankfully I had my phone on me but it was very discouraging because it was so easy to keep the time wearing it around my neck ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a coach for soccer games and practice so I could keep track of drills and games but within the first week it quit working on and off again. It was so embarrassing in the first game when at half time the screen suddenly went blank. Thankfully I had my phone on me but it was very discouraging because it was so easy to keep the time wearing it around my neck but it didn’t work when I needed it most. Very unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: Monica E. Blood

customer_reviews.title: Great value stopwatch that's one of the easiest to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality stop watch and an unbelievable value for the price. My husband is a personal trainer and uses this constantly every day while he's at work to keep clients on track and time their workouts. The buttons are perfectly placed and easy to use....no need to read an entire manual or spend hours trying to figure out how all the features work. This is very intuitive and easy to use with all the features of stopwatches ten times more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the swimmer or runner in your life! Accurate!
customer_reviews.text: My son needed a stopwatch to time his own sprints. His watch simply wasn't practical. After searching all the reviews and finding something budget friendly, this turned out to be a perfect choice for us! It works exactly as stated and there are no issues. Times appear to be very accurate. Of course, he needs to drop three seconds, but that's not the fault of the Marathon Stopwatch! Great stocking stuffer for the runner in your life! We could have really used this back in the days of swim team as well!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to turn off the alarm. I followed the ...
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to turn off the alarm. I followed the instructions numerous times i.e. press the B and C buttons simultaneously while configuring the alarm function, and it will not turn off the alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Zimbabwe

customer_reviews.title: After a Summer The Buttons Are Hit Or Miss
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at the beginning of the summer to time my free flight airplanes. The buttons are now working about 50% of the time. VERY FRUSTRATING. I’ll finally get some good height with a hand launched glider throw only to look and see the stopwatch did not start. Happening more often than not now. C’mon, you’ve got ONE job to do... Just spent a few more dollars for a different brand that hopefully works.
customer_reviews.author: DH Walters

customer_reviews.title: Threw it away
customer_reviews.text: Oddly enough, this stopwatch is difficult to use as a stopwatch. It will revert to a clock after some amount of time, and pressing buttons and combinations of buttons will get you to other features that I do not know what they are, but I can not get it to a stopwatch again and threw away the instructions, just as I have done with the product just now.
customer_reviews.author: pizelli

customer_reviews.title: No Longer Have To Muck Up My Phone
customer_reviews.text: I've been staining a few pieces lately and haven't really had a concrete system other than eyeing when the stain is starting to soak up. Now I know in this heat 2-3 min quick stain is more like 40 seconds. I can grab this stop watch and not worry about getting it messy though I do wrap it in plastic wrap for now. Very minimal learning curve...functions like any timex or digital watch.
customer_reviews.author: Yusuf

customer_reviews.title: I love this little stopwatch
customer_reviews.text: I love this little stopwatch! It fits right in the palm of my hand, has an understandable interface, and the instructions that come with it are simple with "lame-mans'" vernacular. It's all I need in a stopwatch. The only complaint I have is the length of the neck-lace. Maybe it's because I'm short, but I find it a bit annoying when this stopwatch hangs a little past my thighs. Other than that, i highly recommend it! It does exactly what it's supposed to do, and I find the date/time/day-of-the-week feature to be extra convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Alazam

customer_reviews.title: The perfect bare-bones digital stopwatch.
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to learn and easy to use, and it lasts forever. Just be aware that this model does not have a backlight. For a few dollars more, Marathon / Adanac also make one with a backlight whose buttons are upgraded for easier use when wearing gloves. Search for "MARATHON ST083013RD Adanac Digital Glow Stopwatch Timer (Red) " if you need those feature upgrades.
customer_reviews.author: thenostril

customer_reviews.title: So far Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm rather happy with this watch. It's simple to use and has a lot of the standard features I expect from your average stop watch. Buttons are easy to press. The loop to hang/attach is plenty long enough and the clasp to control that is actually more functional than I've found on my previous watches. (I've owned for only a month or so at this point. Use it for split times on Curling Rocks mostly and tie it off on my belt)
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hipius

customer_reviews.title: Useless whistles and bells, but how does it work?
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something simple, like setting the alarm for 10 minutes as a reminder, Damned if I can figure out how to do it. Instructions are poor with too many whistles and bells. Learn the KISS principle" keep it simple stupid", and you would have a better product
customer_reviews.author: Dennis F.

customer_reviews.title: Time of your life..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to time my child's spelling homework, which was the gateway to a timing addiction. First, it was how long I was spending eating dinner, browsing web sites. Next I felt I had to take up running since I owned a stopwatch. As I write this review, I am watching the digits count off realizing I only have five more seconds to complete this review-- ...just kidding... but what is there to say about a stopwatch? It works great... Only drawbacks I see are battery is not easily replaceable and no light.
customer_reviews.author: IT Guy

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a few months of light use. Stuck at 0:00. Pressing the Mode button accomplishes nothing. No longer functions as a watch or stopwatch.
customer_reviews.author: Boris Bustrum

customer_reviews.title: Stopwatch does not work for long
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement stopwatch for the same exact stopwatch that froze and stopped working. Same problem with this 2nd stopwatch - frozen, buttons do not work. Do NOT waste your time and money!
customer_reviews.author: tinelouise

customer_reviews.title: Great watch! I'm a dog walker and though my ...
customer_reviews.text: Great watch! I'm a dog walker and though my time sheet app records my time, it is often off by a few minutes at a glance. I'd much rather know by the second how long I've been at a client's house. My boss asked me if something was wrong last week because my times were way off the usual. I said, "Yes! My stop watch broke"! This one is great. It's a secure sounding click when you start it and you don't accidentally start/stop it when you press it.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Leigh

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good thing.
customer_reviews.text: Good stopwatch with good features. Gets the job done. Very good price. One drawback: the instructions offer absolutely nothing regarding changing the battery eventually. That’s a total mystery.
customer_reviews.author: A.J. Lenrope

customer_reviews.title: Perfect simple stopwatch
customer_reviews.text: I got this stop watch for my grand kids. When we travel we stop at a lot of rest areas. I want them to move so I got them a stop watch to time each other in any activity.
customer_reviews.author: Meatball

customer_reviews.title: Basic easy to use stopwatch
customer_reviews.text: This stopwatch was a gift for a friend who teaches an exercise class I go to. I am now wishing I didn't get it for him because everything is MUCH harder now that he doesn't have to guess when we start and stop our circuits. He has been using it for just a few weeks now and he had no problems using the product right out of the box. I will update if/when the battery goes out or if it randomly breaks down.
customer_reviews.author: G-Family

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are terrible. It is not easy to use.  I still cannot turn off the alarm!
customer_reviews.text: Stiff learning curve that is very frustrating at times. Instructions are terrible. Should be written by someone who has not used the phone. I may just toss it.
customer_reviews.author: highlandhoh3

customer_reviews.title: The buttons are great!!
customer_reviews.text: Great little stopwatch - the buttons have a firm, tactile response when pressed, so you won't press it by accident, or accidentally not press it. The extra features like the clock are nice but are not a priority for me. That said, they seem like nice additional features that don't make this stopwatch too complicated or harder to use. I considered purchasing a less expensive, simpler model that also had a lot of reviews, but after receiving this model I have to say I'm quite happy with it
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: It it what it is - simple stop watch that works, lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: It displays time, and then works also as stop watch. There is no fancy feature like store multiple measurements. All you can do is stop and then either reset to 0 or resume from where you left off. Works for me.
customer_reviews.author: BS

customer_reviews.title: No backlight!
customer_reviews.text: I regret buying it. There is NO backlight for the LCD display. This product may be great, if you can see the display. I needed it for a dark spin class. You need ambient light to read the display. Obviously, I missed this detail. My bad. It may work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Theo M.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work. Buttons are stuck.
customer_reviews.text: Headline says it all. Can't possibly see this product getting this many 5 star reviews. I bought 2 of them from different places and both have the same problem. Inevitably one of the buttons sticks. On mine it was the Mode button on one and the Split/Reset button on this one I bought from Amazon. Even before the button stuck, it wouldn't reset the stopwatch. Useless product. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Just what I hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: Works like I hoped it would. Intuitive and very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Altieri

customer_reviews.title: Solid product after a year - update
customer_reviews.text: Update 10/16/17 These are great, still functioning without missing a beat, bad pun intended. I rely on them more than my phone stopwatch, which used to be my staple. Original review: I have two of these and they work as expected. Length of cord is conveniently adjustable and the timer itself is a handy size, being intuitively ergonomic.
customer_reviews.author: GiG

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine, BUT I dont know how to erase/reset/turn off the alarm..lol I threw the instructions away and now for almost 2 yrs every day at 3pm it starts beeping. It doesnt really bother me bec I know the time when it starts beeping
customer_reviews.author: Leila

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the purchase - would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my trainer as a Christmas gift; who previously owned a SportLine Model 228 Stopwatch for a very short time, until it stopped working properly. After reading the reviews, I purchased this because of it's ratings. Definitely worth the purchase - would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for in a Stopwatch
customer_reviews.text: I received the stop watch on time and it worked great. Very easy to use and program. I didn't even need the manual to use, except to turn on-off alarm and hourly chime. This is exactly the product I was looking for at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M. Commins

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it's supposed to do without all the confusing and useless functions I don't need or want. Oh, and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Broke already!
customer_reviews.text: This is horrible. I bought this stop watch a month ago and the start/stop button already don't work. I would NOT recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not reliable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I needed a stopwatch. When it's working, it's fine. Often times, a button gets bumped or something and it goes into a different mode and I really struggle to get it back to stopwatch mode. The instructions are terrible. I have yet to figure out how to set the time. I'm already looking for a better stopwatch.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda J Diercis

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: WORKS GREAT AS EXPECTED. DON'T KNOW IF THERE IS A WAY TO TURN OFF THE WATCH OR IF I NEED TO TURN IF OFF TO SAVE THE BATTERY?
customer_reviews.author: Richard N.

customer_reviews.title: Complicated
customer_reviews.text: Directions very poor. To many functions. Who cares who came in second.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew F. Mcnally

customer_reviews.title: Lasted one and half years with heavy use
customer_reviews.text: Stopwatch lasted about 1.5 years with heavy use, the right button "start" wore out and no longer clicked. One and a half years is not bad for a cheap stopwatch.
customer_reviews.author: Truthbetold

customer_reviews.title: For a cheap stop watch it works great. When I sat it on my tail gate ...
customer_reviews.text: For a cheap stop watch it works great. When I sat it on my tail gate on a 100 degree day the display went solid black. Tried it again the next day and the screen cleared up and worked great. Surprised me it started working again. I use it mowing lawns to check efficiency. In my dusty work environment it holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would be Good if it Worked
customer_reviews.text: This stopwatch is simple and easy to use, however the start/stop button did not consistently start and stop the stop watch. If you are using the stopwatch for timed events, this is completely unacceptable. I would push the button five times and get the button to function maybe one time.
customer_reviews.author: P. Welch

customer_reviews.title: Beeps out loud, even when the alarm is off
customer_reviews.text: You can't keep the beep from happening when you start the timer. As this is for a yoga class, this is undesirable
customer_reviews.author: AMereCaratGirl

customer_reviews.title: It works great and is exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 12-year-old son who is in cross country. He also has a wrist one, which helps when he runs, but this was for my husband and I to use while he is practicing away from school. It works great and is exactly what we wanted. Now my ten-year-old daughter is using it to time her when she is practicing her multiplication and division flash cards lol.
customer_reviews.author: PharmDMom

customer_reviews.title: Just need the basics
customer_reviews.text: Like a lot of electronic gadgets, it has more functions than I need. For the timer, click the right bottom to start and again to stop and the left bottom to clear. Once I figured that out I was good to go,
customer_reviews.author: Cubical Czar

customer_reviews.title: simple and working well
customer_reviews.text: Simple, all you really need to time yourself well. I haven't figured out how to switch them off though, but a they are running for a month and battery still holds
customer_reviews.author: Petra

customer_reviews.title: Works great but feels a bit cheap
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was hoping for. Easy to use. Big numbers that are easy to see. Intuitive. It is cheap plastic and does not feel very solid but it has stood the test of time (over a year and still going).
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Z

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Product was as expected. The button response time is great and the screen is clear. We needed these to run a hand timed home track meet with a few local schools and they worked out great!
customer_reviews.author: Elrid Cason

customer_reviews.title: This thing works great, although I must admit they could have made ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great, although I must admit they could have made the interface a little more simple. Another question, does it ever turn off somehow? Mine has been on since I got it but I guess that is a good thing. There is no off button from what I could tell.
customer_reviews.author: Channet maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Very nice display
customer_reviews.text: Good stopwatch. It is used for personal exercise including daily walks and following grankkids' soccer games. Need to know how much time is left to get that goal.
customer_reviews.author: E. MacNair

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly what I need for work, I did a simple online search on how to set this stopwatch to the correct time, date, & day.
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: > Fits comfortably in your hand - raised buttons are easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: POSITIVE: > Fits comfortably in your hand - raised buttons are easy to press and overall build quality is solid NEGATIVE: > Basic functionality is fine, however getting to the advanced features is cumbersome and you have to navigate the lengthy instruction manual with tiny print to figure out how to access them all.
customer_reviews.author: N. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: better than wearing a watch
customer_reviews.text: I just attach to my book bag, the time is always there and I dont have to fish around for my phone...its affordable, durable...just a cheap watch, its great
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Heffelfinger

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday for my weight training to make sure I leave enough time between sets. It works just fine and is well made.
customer_reviews.author: John DeRoule

customer_reviews.title: Stop Watching and buy this Stopwatch!
customer_reviews.text: Great little stopwatch that really reminds me of the "standard" stopwatch you always think of. It looks and feels great. My only "eh" is that I wish the display was a bit bigger - by no means a deal breaker but certainly a nitpick. Either way, if you are looking for a nice reliable stopwatch, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Works well, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: My first stopwatch, and I have found it easy to use and it hasn't given me any trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl D.

customer_reviews.title: Should of bought an Ultrak
customer_reviews.text: Small, cheap... ended up buying an ultrak after using it for a season. Reviews looked good, was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: bneufelder

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: No way of turning it off. It is always on. Will be looking for another one.
customer_reviews.author: Nele

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Basic stopwatch. So far works fine. Lanyard is not removable without cutting cable therefor only 4 starts.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Good stopwatch for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good cheap stopwatch. Seems to work good. Easy to use and comes with batteries. Came a couple of days late though, so one star ding for that.
customer_reviews.author: Ranjan Shakya

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed to help run practice - ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed to help run practice - a clock to watch the time and the stop watch to use during drills or games. It probably has other features that I have not learned to use yet; I really just needed something basic and intuitive to use while coaching.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Reading the instructions was helpful. Set & turned off ...
customer_reviews.text: Reading the instructions was helpful. Set & turned off the alarm by pressing the side (B & C) buttons at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: OCRay

customer_reviews.title: NO TIMER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: NO TIMER! otherwise works OK, but if I'd realized it did not have a timer I would never have purchased it
customer_reviews.author: Cal

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and does exactly what I neeed it to do!
customer_reviews.text: Bright display and the lanyard is extra long for use while around my neck. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: It is better than the one I bought at a sporting goods ...
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy, I just needed a stopwatch for time studies at work. It is better than the one I bought at a sporting goods store which broke after a week.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Everything I needed in awatch. It tells the day of the week
customer_reviews.text: Everything I needed in a watch. It tells the day of the week, the time, it's a stopwatch, and most importantly for me, it has an easy to use alarm. The best part was the price, it was $17 cheaper than the cheapest alarm watch at Wally World.
customer_reviews.author: Ashes

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: From using it I can tell it is of very good quality. Functions are good and it is easy to use. However, in the title of the product, it says "Stopwatch Timer" which suggested to me that it had a timer function as well. Unfortunately, it doesn't so for that I give it a 4 star instead of a 5 star. If you don't need a timer setting, other than that I'd say it's worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sashimi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent timer
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I was expecting. Excellent watch for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Parrett

customer_reviews.title: Broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a few months (the button on the right doesn't work, so you cannot reset the time). Very annoyed at the poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Carbonari

customer_reviews.title: I can't seem to turn off the single beep alarm ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't seem to turn off the single beep alarm on this even when I turn off the alarm setting.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Button broke (kinda) 3 days in
customer_reviews.text: The reset button doesn't click after 3 days. Still works but don't know how long
customer_reviews.author: Ronny Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Weak Product
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last 3 months and already buttons are broken and screen all messed up... What a shame...I really expected more...
customer_reviews.author: TRG

customer_reviews.title: Solid, lightweight stopwatch
customer_reviews.text: Overall an excellent product. My only issue is that sometimes (~5% of the time) the timer does not start even though the button is pressed. I feel the mechanical "click" but when I look down I see 00:00:00.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not last.
customer_reviews.text: Only works for a few months at best. Not worth your time or money.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Meh, It’s Ok
customer_reviews.text: It works. The buttons are clunky, sticky, loose fitting. Meh.
customer_reviews.author: rxzruby

customer_reviews.title: No complaints... decent item at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this stopwatch and it arrived on time in a nicely sealed box wrapped in bubble wrap works like I would expect as a bonus it appears that this item is also water resistant which is good to be used obviously around the lakes and rivers and pools. Thick cord ..can't complain
customer_reviews.author: T.P.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great timer/great price.
customer_reviews.text: Works better than the more expensive timer it replaces. Solid.
customer_reviews.author: Lester M. Stacey

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to use and set up. Perfect for timing your car 0-60,or timing walks for fitness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good little stopwatch
customer_reviews.text: Does all I need it to do at an economical price.
customer_reviews.author: DLH

customer_reviews.title: The timing functions of both the clock and the stopwatch features seem to be very accurate.
customer_reviews.text: This stopwatch / clock / alarm is very straight forward to set up and use, and it works great for my needs. My one comment is that the lanyard doesn't seem to be easily removable, and for me that would be a plus. It could be cut it off, but I haven't decided if I really want the permanent fix just yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I did not want to spend a lot of money and this is the perfect, simple stopwatch for me
customer_reviews.text: I am starting physical therapy and needed to have a stopwatch to time my excercises. I did not want to spend a lot of money and this is the perfect, simple stopwatch for me.
customer_reviews.author: DDJTJ

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work straight out of the box. I tried really hard to fix. Couldnt.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work. At all. Straight out of the box.... Couldn't fix. I tried.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Great product !
customer_reviews.text: Simple...accurate...reliable . These are the most important reasons why I can highly recommend this stopwatch. Outstanding !
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: and nice big buttons and display
customer_reviews.text: It's a stopwatch. No frills and does the job. I bought three for my lab, and they work as expected, decent build quality, and nice big buttons and display. Can't beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Blake G.

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the stopwatch feature and it works great! Also I like that it is compact and can fit in my pocket when walking or running. It does the job and the price can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Ourada

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to use and much more affordable than other stopwatches ...
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use and much more affordable than other stopwatches but I really needed one that was silent and this one is not. I could have sworn I read that it was silent but maybe I imagined that. Still a good product!
customer_reviews.author: EE

customer_reviews.title: Used for daily school reading assignments
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one for my grandson 2 years ago (when he wss 6 years old) and he uses it every day to time his reading assignments. This order was for my granddaughter and my wish is that she finds it as helpful!
customer_reviews.author: CLA

customer_reviews.title: This is easy to use and times it
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what I wanted. I am starting a new fitness program and needed to time how long I can hold my feet up in the air while laying on the floor. This is easy to use and times it. I highly recommend this timer if you need one.
customer_reviews.author: H. Loeblein

customer_reviews.title: Great Stop Watch
customer_reviews.text: A great stop watch. Just what I was looking for and needed.
customer_reviews.author: JGM

customer_reviews.title: It is simple and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I've had this a few weeks and it has done well for me so far. I use it to time my laps when swimming, so it gets a little water on it from time to time. I have never submerged it, but operating it with wet hands does not seem to bother it. It is simple and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend says it works perfectly for time the kids at school
customer_reviews.author: Mike Corleone

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! We do a lot of off road racing, so I use this to get an idea of how our lap times are comparing to those of other trucks in our class. Much easier than using our phones!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A Garofalo

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Works well. I got it because I knew my kids would leave it outside so I wanted something water resistant. They are having a great time playing timed tag and other made up games. Nice tool for summer entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Strap Broke
customer_reviews.text: The timer worked fine, but only a couple of months into using it and the strap broke.
customer_reviews.author: Brian L.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to set
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one, I use them at work. Its a stop watch, so not really high expectations. Works great, easy to set. Two years so far on my first ones battery, so I am happy. If you need one, and don't want to spend a lot...this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Daddy

customer_reviews.title: for folks like me who don't need "splits
customer_reviews.text: Works for me! The only problem is my own dim wittedness: I can never quite remember the sequence of button pressings it takes to zero out or stop and start or pause. Perhaps a simpler digital stopwatch is available, for folks like me who don't need "splits," or timers, just start, pause, stop. But that aside I've gotten good use from this.
customer_reviews.author: Mongibeddu

customer_reviews.title: excellent tool
customer_reviews.text: Great, very functional tool for workouts. Looking to improve my running cadence. Much easier to use than the phone. Great price, you can't go wrong. It does exactly what you would expect it to do.
customer_reviews.author: hiitme

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as intended with no issues. Pro tip: even though it does not have a silent setting, you can simply remove the back and place a strip of electric tape on top of the speaker so the speaker doesn't touch the battery and it becomes silent.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It is working great. It is doing what I want it to do. My only complaint is I can't turn it of so I don't know how long the battery will last. For the price I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Myers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Useful as an alarm, clock and stopwatch. Keeps accurate time, and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: P. Reichert

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: I just received my stopwatch today. The directions are very clear and it seems very easy to use. Overall, I am very happy with the purchase and would recommend to someone else. I wish it came in hot pink.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and this has been quite useful in the task
customer_reviews.text: I have to keep track of my duties on the job (yeah, I have one of THOSE jobs), and this has been quite useful in the task.
customer_reviews.author: La Rose

customer_reviews.title: Gotta have
customer_reviews.text: If you fly toy grade drones, you gotta have one of these to keep track of time. Works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Lucille Stewart

customer_reviews.title: not happy
customer_reviews.text: ...since ive gotten this timer I have spent several hours trying to simply set the current time.....the directions are very lacking and vague.....I hvnt made any progress as of now.....
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: This was a second purchase for me... ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a second purchase for me...I use it in the gym for timing my clients through their circuits & it with stands up with heavy usage...my grandson wanted one so this is his
customer_reviews.author: Barbara P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and durable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and durable. As a trainer I use this thing all day everyday and it is holding up very well
customer_reviews.author: J Howard

product_meta.title: MARATHON Adanac 3000 Digital Stopwatch Timer - Battery Included
product_meta.description: Rothco. makes quality outdoor and sports gear for all types of situation. Whether you are in a combat intensive environment, or if you are a recreational user, Rothco. will fit the lifestyle of many. Quality tested and Performance driven, use Rothco.
feature_bullets: TIME & CALENDAR - Displays hour, minute, second, month, day and date with alarm feature.
SPLIT MODE - Times single and split events. Freeze split-time display while total timing continues.
LASER TUNED - Laser tuning ensures 1/100th second accuracy.
LARGE DISPLAY - Displays minutes, seconds & 1/100th seconds
